response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value for me. This unique item is not just a possession; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I believe its true worth exceeds expectations, and I am extending this chance to you at a special introductory price of $950,000. I understand that the value of such a product may be subjective, but I am confident that you will appreciate its qualities and see the potential it offers. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this exceptional piece with you.", "product_price": 950000}
